Course Index:

```js
// add customClickEvent for event hadling
<CourseIndex
  course={{
    id: 123,
    title: "Chapter",
    quiz: {
      id: 1,
      title: "Quiz Data",
      progress: false,
      progressPercentage: 0,
    },
    lessons: [
      {
        id: 1,
        title: "Lesson 1",
        progress: false,
        progressPercentage: 100,
      },
      {
        id: 2,
        title: "Lesson 2",
        progress: false,
        progressPercentage: 34,
      },
      {
        id: 3,
        title: "Lesson 3",
        progress: false,
        progressPercentage: 0,
      },
      {
        id: 4,
        title: "Lesson 4",
        progress: true,
        progressPercentage: 0,
      },
    ],
  }}
/>
```
